TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TrainCatalogBase extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A training catalog is an object instantiable by a user to do various tasks relating to a particular "area" of machine learning. A subclass would represent a particular task in machine learning. The idea is that a user can instantiate that particular area, and get trainers and evaluators.

Docs.summary: Train the on folds of the data sequentially. Return each model and each scored test dataset.

Public Function TrainTestSplit (data As IDataView, Optional testFraction As Double = 0.1, Optional samplingKeyColumn As String = null, Optional seed As Nullable(Of UInteger) = null) As TrainCatalogBase.TrainTestData
member this.TrainTestSplit : Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView * double * string * Nullable<uint32> -> Microsoft.ML.TrainCatalogBase.TrainTestData

Docs.param: The fraction of data to go into the test set.

Name of a column to use for grouping rows. If two examples share the same value of the , they are guaranteed to appear in the same subset (train or test). This can be used to ensure no label leakage from the train to the test set. If no row grouping will be performed.
Seed for the random number generator used to select rows for the train-test split.
Docs.summary: Split the dataset into the train set and test set according to the given fraction. Respects the if provided.
